hint: Push filters early into CTEs, convert implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax for better cardinality estimates, and pre-filter dimension tables before the main join.
Isolate selective date_dim filters into dedicated CTEs, pre-filter all dimension tables with explicit JOINs, and consider materializing filtered fact subsets.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact tables into separate CTEs, then restructure the main self-join to compute aggregations once before the final self-join.
Eliminate the costly self-join by computing year-over-year aggregates in a single pass using conditional aggregation (CASE statements) within the cross_sales CTE.
